overview: Neal Cury has been a leader in Health Care Administration for over 25 years. His career has included operational oversight of behavioral and acute care hospitals, resetting the direction of the facilities to make the hospitals profitable. Prior to joining Ascend, Neal was co-founder and Chief Operating Officer of Heartland Health Developments. After completing his masterâ€™s degree at Duke in 1981, Neal spent 14 years at HCA, Inc. then over 4 years with Behavioral Health Corporation before joining Dr. Richard Kresch at Heartland in 1999.
